column2: "Na Josef sii mu kɔr fie na ɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Farao
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column8: fi Keenan asaase do aba; na

column2: "Na ɔfaa no nuanom no hɔn mu beenum
column3: na ɔdze hɔn kɛkyerɛɛ Farao."

column2: "Na Farao bisaa no nuanom no dɛ
column3: Wɔyɛ ebɛn edwuma? Na wɔsee Farao dɛ

column2: "Na wɔsee Farao dɛ
column3: Yɛaba dɛ yɛrebɛtsena asaase yi do; na wo nkowaa hɔn nguan nnya edzidzibea; osiandɛ ɔkɔm no mu ayɛ dzen wɔ Keenan asaase do: dɛm ntsi afei
column5: ma wo nkowaa ntsena Gosen asaase do."

column2: "Na Farao kaa kyerɛɛ Josef dɛ
column3: W'egya nye wo nuanom aba wo nkyɛn:"

column2: "Egypt asaase da w'enyim; asaase no mu mbrɛ oye no na ma w'egya nye wo nuanom ntsena; ma wɔntsena Gosen asaase do: na sɛ inyim hɔn mu bi a wɔyɛ mbɔdzembɔfo a
column3: ɔno yɛ hɔn mo mbowa do ahwɛfo."

column2: "Na Josef dze n'egya Jakob bae begyinaa Farao n'enyim: na Jakob hyiraa Farao."
"Na Farao bisaa Jakob dɛ
column3: Wo nkwa nda mu mfe yɛ ahen?"

column2: "Na Jakob see Farao dɛ
column3: M'akwantu ne mfe nda yɛ mfe ɔha eduasa: mo nkwa ne mfe nda kumaabi na mbusu nko
column4: na ɔnntoo m'egyanom hɔn nkwa ne mfe nda wɔ hɔn akwantu ber no mu."

column2: "Na Jakob hyiraa Farao
column3: na ofii Farao n'enyim kɔree."

column2: "Na Josef maa n'egya nye no nuanom no tsenabew
column3: na ɔmaa hɔn beebi wɔ Egypt asaase do
column4: wɔ asaase no do mbrɛ oye
column6: dɛ mbrɛ Farao hyɛe no ara."

column2: "Na Josef bɔɔ n'egya
column3: nye no nuanom
column4: nye n'egya ne fifo nyinara akɔhoma
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee."

column2: "Nna edziban nnyi asaase no do beebiara; na ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen dodoodow
column3: ma Egypt asaase nye Keenan asaase tɔɔ bitsi wɔ ɔkɔm no ntsi."

column2: "Na Josef boaboaa sika a wonyaa no Egypt asaase do
column3: nye Keenan asaase do no
column4: eburow a wɔtɔe no ne sika no nyinara ano: na Josef dze sika no baa Farao fie."

column2: "Na aber a nkorɔfo ho sika nyinara sae wɔ Egypt nye Keenan asaase do no
column3: Egyptfo no nyinara baa Josef hɔ
column5: Ma hɛn edziban: na ɔbɛyɛ dɛn ntsi na yebowuwu wɔ w'enyim? Hɛn ho sika asa."

column2: "Na Josef see dɛ
column3: sɛ hom ho sika asa a
column4: hom mfa hom mbowa mma; na mebɛgye hom mbowa na mama hom bi."

column2: "Na wɔdze hɔn mbowa brɛɛ Josef: na Josef maa hɔn edziban dze gyee mpɔnkɔ
column3: nye nguan
column5: nye nsoasopɔnkɔ: na ɔmaa hɔn edziban dze gyee hɔn mbowa nyinara wɔ afe no mu."

column2: "Na afe no bɛsenee no
column3: wɔbaa no hɔ afe a otsia ebien no
column6: hɛn sika nyinara asa; na hɛn mbowa nyinara yɛ mo wura dze; biribiara nnyi hɔ a ɔaka wɔ mo wura n'enyim
column7: ka hɛn honam nye hɛn asaase ho;"

column2: "ebɛnadze ntsi na yebowu w'enyim
column3: hɛn nye hɛn asaase nyina? Fa edziban tɔ hɛn nye hɛn asaase
column4: na hɛn nye hɛn asaase bɛyɛ asomfo ama Farao: na ma hɛn eduaba
column7: na amma asaase yi aannda pan."

column2: "Nna Josef tɔɔ Egypt asaase nyinara maa Farao; na Egyptfo nyinara tontɔɔn hɔn haban
column3: osiandɛ ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ hɔn do: na asaase no bɛyɛɛ Farao dze."

column2: "Na nkorɔfo no dze
column3: ɔdaan hɔn nkowaa otuu hɔn hɔ ma wɔkɛtsenatsenaa nkurow a ofi Egypt ɔhe no kurotsia kɛpem ne kurotsia no mu."

column2: "Asɔfo no hɔn asaase nko na ɔanntɔ: osiandɛ Farao maa asɔfo no kyɛfa bi
column3: na wodzii hɔn kyɛfa a Farao dze maa hɔn no; dɛm ntsi wɔanntɔn hɔn asaase."

column2: "Nna Josef see nkorɔfo no dɛ
column3: Hwɛ matɔ hom nye hom asaase ndɛ ama Farao: hwɛ
column5: na hom nkoduadua no wɔ asaase no do."

column2: "Na dza ɔbɛyɛ nye dɛ
column3: hom dze ekuadze yi mu mbumu enum enum bɛma Farao
column4: na anan no ayɛ homankasa homdze
column5: ma wɔdze bi edua haban mu
column7: nye hom fifo nye hom mbofraba edziban."

column2: "Na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Agye hɛn nkwa: ma yennya mo wura n'enyim enyimnyam

column2: "Na Josef dze yɛɛ mbra too hɔ wɔ Egypt asaase do ɔdze bɛpem ndɛ ara
column3: dɛ wɔmfa mbumu enum enum mma Farao; gyedɛ asɔfo no hɔn asaase nkotsee na annyɛ Farao dze."

column2: "Na Israel tsenaa Egypt wɔ Gosen asaase do; na wonyaa egyapadze wɔ hɔ
column3: na wɔwowoe

column2: "Na Jakob tsenaa Egypt asaase do mfe duesuon: na Jakob ne nda
column3: no nkwa ne mfe

column2: "Na mber a Israel dze bowu no bɛnee no: ɔfrɛɛ ne ba Josef
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Sɛ afei menya w'enyim enyimnyam a
column6: fa wo nsa to m'aserɛ ase
column7: na enye me ndzi no ayamuyie mu nye nokwar mu; meserɛ wo

column2: "na sɛ mokɔ me nsamankyir a
column3: ɔno soa me fi Egypt
column4: na kesie me wɔ m'egyanom hɔn esiei. Na ɔsee dɛ
column5: Mebɛyɛ dɛ mbrɛ aka no ara."

column2: "Na Jakob see dɛ
column3: Dzi nsew kyerɛ me: nna Josef dzii nsew kyerɛɛ no. Na Israel bɔɔ no mu adze wɔ mpa no n'etsifi."
